## StabilityDepositChange type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StabilityDepositChange<T> = {
    depositLUSD: T;
    withdrawLUSD?: undefined;
} | {
    depositLUSD?: undefined;
    withdrawLUSD: T;
    withdrawAllLUSD: boolean;
};
```
